m_szDocTitle: CES 2016 gets underway in Las Vegas – in pictures | The National
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- CES 2016 gets underway in Las Vegas – in pictures January 7, 2016 The world’s largest annual consumer technology trade show, runs through January 9 and will feature about 3,600 exhibitors showing off their latest products and services to more than 150,000 attendees. The Toyota FCV Plus, a hydrogen fuel cell concept vehicle which capable to generate electricity directly from hydrogen stored outside and operate as a stable source of electric power for use at home or on the go. Alex Wong / Getty Images / AFP Reed Hastings, co-founder and CEO of Netflix, delivers a
